:py:mod:`pocketpose.models.registry`
====================================

.. py:module:: pocketpose.models.registry

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Registry for models. 

   This module contains a registry for models. The registry is used to register
   models, which can then be retrieved by name using the model factory.

   Example:
       >>> from pocketpose.models.registry import model_registry
       >>> @model_registry.register("model1")



Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: model_registry
